Online Training Courses

Role(s)
Studio User
Player Developer
Device SDK Developer

This topic lists all of the on-demand training courses that are available.

 

>> Register for instructor-led, online training

 

Name Product Focus Role Duration Description
Video Cloud Basics Video Cloud Studio User 16:38 Learn the basics on how to upload and publish videos using Video Cloud Studio
Introduction to Video Cloud Video Cloud Studio User 35:37 Learn how to upload, manage and publish videos using Video Cloud Studio
Introduction to Video Cloud Analytics Video Cloud Studio User 24:06 Learn about the types of analytics that are available inside Video Cloud Studio
Introduction to Brightcove Gallery Gallery Studio User 17:39 Learn about Gallery and the types of experiences that can be created.
Building In-Page Experiences using Gallery Gallery Studio User 32:17 Learn how to create and publish an in-page experience using Brightcove Gallery.
Building Portal Experiences using Gallery Gallery Studio User 33:46 Learn how to create and publish a portal experience using Brightcove Gallery.
Developing with the Brightcove Player Video Cloud
Brightcove Player		 Player Developer 1:12:14 Learn to use JavaScript, CSS and HTML to customize the behavior and appearance of the Brightcove Player.
Quick Start to Player Management Video Cloud
Brightcove Player		 Player Developer 32:45 Learn to create, update and publish a player using Terminal and the curl tool.
Developing with the Brightcove Native Player SDK for Android Video Cloud
Brightcove Player		 Device SDK Developer 29:27 Learn to create a native video app for Android devices.
Developing with the Brightcove Native Player SDK for iOS Video Cloud
Brightcove Player		 Device SDK Developer 25:31 Learn to create a native video app for iOS devices.
